result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas R Edgren was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating w/ PAC (5th or 6th) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant eligible for early release after serving 50% of probation upon Agent's approval.
**Amended 5/17/17 to include defendant's date of birth.
AODA Assessment and Drivers Safety Plan.

miscConds.notes: Defendant shall submit to any assessments and fully participate in any counseling deemed appropriate by the Agent and abide by any treatment recommendations.

Defendant shall receive Alcohol and other Drug Assessment from Waupaca County DHHS or other licensed agency as determined by Agent and abide by any treatment recommendations.
Defendant shall attend Victim Offender Impact Panel on 5/11/17 at 7:00 p.m.

timeConds.notes:
5 months stayed.
Defendant may serve in Waushara County if arrangements can be made.
